description.en:
Floki Adventure (FIAT) is an ERC20 token on the Ethereum blockchain. 
It's purpose is to serve as the utility token for a play-to-earn (P2E) mobile video game (Floki Inu Adventure) where players navigate different levels and complete challenges in order to earn tokens. 
FIAT is used to unlock in-game special features, upgrades, and downloadable skins.
